飬字的基本解释

飬
yǎng
古同“养”。

飬
juǎn
古同“餋”。

飬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎng］
［《廣韻》餘兩切，上養，以。］
亦作“羪1”。“养1”的繁体字。亦作“飬1”。
(1)供给人食物及生活所必需，使生活下去。
(2)生育。
(3)特指哺乳。
(4)扶育而非亲生的。
(5)饲养。
(6)种植；培植。
(7)指耕种。
(8)财用；生活所需。
(9)培养。
(10)指修养，涵养。
(11)教育；熏陶。
(12)保养；保持。
(13)医治；疗养。
(14)补养；使受补益。
(15)恣纵；助长。
(16)蓄；积。
(17)役使。
(18)攻取。
(19)取法。
(20)为探取。
(21)主持，执掌。
(22)指主持者，执掌者。
(23)欢乐。《广雅·释诂》：“養，樂也。”王念孙疏证：“《韓詩外傳》云：'聞其徵聲，使人樂養而好施。'《白虎通義》樂養作喜養……是養爲樂也。”《文选·谢灵运〈拟魏太子”邺中集“诗·王粲〉》：“既作長夜飲，豈顧乘日養。”张铣注：“養，樂也。”一说，久长。
(24)隐蔽。《大戴礼记·曾

飬字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　飬； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1417第14
【五音集韻】同餋。

飬字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
飬字的起名意思

暂无。

飬
Basic explanation of words
飬
yǎng
Gu Tong "raise".
飬
juǎn
The ancient same "shun".
飬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎng］
["Guangyun" more than two cuts, upper support, to. ]
Also known as "羪1". Traditional characters for "养1". Also known as "飬1".
(1) Provide people with food and life necessities to make life go on.
(2) Fertility.
(3) Specifically refers to breastfeeding.
(4) Nurturing rather than biological.
(5) Feeding.
(6) Planting; Cultivation.
(7) Refers to farming.
(8) Financial use; life needs.
(9) Cultivation.
(10) Refers to self-cultivation and self-cultivation.
(11) Education; edification.
(12) Maintenance; maintenance.
(13) Healing; convalescence.
(14) Nourishment; to benefit.
(15) Indulgent; encourage.
(16) Accumulation; accumulation.
(17) Servants.
(18) Attack.
(19) Take the method.
(20) is for exploration.
(21) Presiding over and in charge.
(22) Refers to the host, the person in charge.
(23) Joy. "Guangya·Shigu": "Yang, Le Ye." Wang Niansun Shuzheng: "Han Shi Wai Zhuan" says: "Hearing the sound of the Zheng, makes people happy to support and good to give." "Baihu Tongyi" Le Yang Zuo Xi Raising...is raising for pleasure." "Selected Works · Xie Lingyun "Primary Prince Wei" Yezhong Collection "Poetry·Wang Can"": "Since it is used as a long night drink, how can you care for raising by day." Zhang Xian's note: "Raise, Le Ye." One said, for a long time.
(24) Concealment. "The Great Dai Li Ji · Zeng
